tool_description: A captcha generator tool with different settings for difficulty.
name: Captcha Generator
title: Captcha Generator

api_list.name: Captcha Generator
api_list.description: This is a captcha generator tool that gives you an image of 270x80 pixels and the text solution. It has different settings that allows you to configure the captcha difficulty, and even create a captcha with a custom text solution.

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.description: A custom captcha solution text. Default text solution is set aleatory
